comments.html: Doubt no more! Whenever a router has to perform an L3 lookup, it will signal implicit (or explicit) null. ABR is no exception (which, as it happens, is also documented above ;) ). That's the reason you should never summarize BGP next hops in MPLS/VPN networks.
